subject: Updation of Project specific information on Project Management Software/Data Lake Portal by AE/IE.
text:

National Highways Authority of India NHAL 
(Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 
st-5 6, dET-10, ATT, T frt -110 075 
G-5 &6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 
NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/Project Management Software/2020 
No. 6.25/2020 dated the 30th December, 2020 
(Decision taken on e-office file no. NHAl/11018/01/2008-PQ Comp. No. 54149) 
Sub: Updation of project specific information on Project Management Software/ Data 
Lake Portal by AE/IE. 
Ref: NHAI/Policy Circular No. NHAI/IT/Data Lake/05 dated 21st April 2020. 
The directions for uploading all correspondence related to the project on Data Lake 
Portal were issued vide Policy Circular of NHAI dated 21.04.2020. All the correspondence between Concessionaire/Consultant/Project Director/Regional Officer pertaining to the 
projects are to be exchanged through this portal only. 
2. Directions have further been issued vide NHAI's Policy Guidelines No. 6.24/2020 dated 
03.11.2020 for uploading the project specific information such as all project documents, 
videos, photos, test reports, NSV reports, FWD reports and road inventory reports. It was also 
decided that all Contractors/ Concessionaires/ Consultants should mandatorily submit the bills 
in the PMS/ Data Lake only and no physical bills should be accepted from 17.09.2020 for 
payments. 
3. It has been observed that most of the Consultants are still not regularly updating and 
uploading the required information on the Project Management Software/ Data Lake Portal 
and the Authority is unable to ascertain whether the consultants are performing their tasks as 
per the provisions of Terms of Reference (TOR). 
4. All PDs are therefore directed to processthe payments of consultants only after 
ascertaining that all the detailsrequired to be uploaded on Data Lake have been completed/ 
updated by IE/AE. 
5. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 
(Sheo Shankar Jha) 
CGM (Coord.)
